about_the_game:
In SCRAPS BATTLE, travel through time and space and face off against your friends in wacky challenges ! As a 4-man team, travel through the ages and complete mini-games to try to win the title of SCRAPS KING.

  • UP TO 4 PLAYER WITH CHANGEABLE TEAMS !

Play with 3 friends and compete in a sequence of mini-games with constantly shifting teams. Either in 1 versus all, 2 against 2 or in a free for all, never loose sight of your one and only objective, fight for victory !

  • DIFFERENT TIME PERIODS !

Beware, because the Time-Machine is up to no good! From Pirates to robots from the future, travel through time to collect key artifacts necessary to ensure your victory.

  • BE THE ROBOT OF THE MONTH.

         

Play a succesion of mini-games with your friends in the gamemode SCRAPS KING, and try to become the first one to win 5 artifacts to be awarded the title of ROBOT OF THE MONTH by the "inventor" !

  • ENDLESS REPLAYABILITY !

The free selection mode gives you the ability to play any mini-games of your choice freely with no limit !

  • A GAMEBREAKING PHYSICS !


Take control of the robot of your choice and get ready to have some fun and use the ever-present physics to create wild outcomes !
